New VoiceObjects Developer Edition Available

Just got an email informing me of a new devloper release of VoiceObjects (version 7.4).Â  This bit caught my attention:

Support for 2-way SMS dialogs

VoiceObjects 7.4 has expanded the text channel so that in addition to USSD dialogs, text messaging from mobile devices using the Short Message Service (SMS) is now supported…

Wow! If you’re a developer and that doesn’t get your juices flowing then you may want to get yourself checked out.

I’m going to download the new version today and start playing around with 2-way SMS messaging.
